text: [Music]

hello I'm kashiv A Cloud support
engineer here at the AWS office in
Sydney today I'm going to show you how
to access anthropic Cloud models on
Amazon Bedrock let's get
started accessing anthropic CLA models
on Amazon Bedrock requires a different
process compared to other Foundation
models let's go through the steps
required to get access first log to AWS
Management console and navigate to
Amazon
Bedrock choose model
access choose available to request for
anthropic CLA model choose request model
access choose
next enter your use case and your
details for this video my use case is
that I want to show customers how to
access Amazon Bedrock choose next now
choose
submit it can take some time until
access is granted after access is
granted for anthropic CLA model let's
use the chat feature to test it choose
chat choose select
model choose anthropic and then choose
model I'll choose CLA 2.1 choose apply
you can now start chatting with the
model for this video I'll ask it to
explain black holes to eighth graders
choose
run the model generates
text and you can view the model Matrix
here in this highlighted area of on the
screen choose the info button and then
adjust the model configuration as you
want thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
